title: As A-list celebrities prepare for The Oscars... so do the hookers, as we reveal the sordid side of the movie business
text:
TV Magazine HOORAY FOR HO-LLYWOOD As A-list celebrities prepare for The Oscars… so do the hookers, as we reveal the sordid side of the movie business 
A booming trade in drugs and vice sees hundreds of young girls pour into LA to profit from the sex trade’s big event From SIMON BOYLE, Associate Bizarre Editor in Hollywood 24th February 2017, 9:32 pm
